1351010.name: RPG Maker MZ - MV Trinity Resource Pack
1351010.description:
Graphic assets from RPG Maker MV Trinity is now available for RPG Maker MZ! Create a super size map with this super size asset pack! This pack has almost everything: side view animated battlers, character walking sprites, faces and pictures, bust-up images, battlebacks, weapons, enemies, parallaxes, tiles, character generator parts and music too!

Features:

CHARACTERS:

・Characters: 23 files (includes 48 characters' TV-walking sprites and TVD)
・SV-animated battlers: 16 characters (8 Actors / 8 MV Trinity cover art characters)
・Face: 48 characters x 1 graphic each
・Pictures: 264 graphics listed below:
・・Bust-up images with 5 emotions x 16 characters from RPG Maker 2000
・・Bust-up images: 80 characters from RPG Maker MV
・・Bust-up images: 79 characters from RPG Maker MV Trinity
・・Bust-up images: 8 cover art characters from RPG Maker MV Trinity
・・Button etc: 17 graphics
・Enemies: 50 graphics
・SV Enemies: 50 graphics

TILES:

・Tiles x 133 files ( Please note that there are some ground tiles and wall tiles in this pack that are the same in RPG Maker MV. There are many Asian / Ethnic style graphics included in this pack)
・・Titles1: 26 kinds included
・・Titles2: 14 kinds included
・Weapons: 7 kinds
・Parallaxes: 22 graphics

BATTLEBACKS:

・Battleback1 x 50 graphics
・Battleback2 x 50 graphics

GENERATOR:

・Generator: 40 Female parts / 39 Male parts / 19 Kids parts (You can use these assets by switching with MZ's default assets)
* To use this generator pack in MZ, you must backup the generator folder in your MZ installation and completely replace it with the generator folder in this DLC pack.

MUSIC:

・BGM: 96 tracks
・SE: 193 tracks
・ME: 19 tracks
・BGS: 12 tracks
